name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Highly skilled Senior Field Engineer with over 10 years of experience in troubleshooting, root cause analysis, and engine automation. Proficient in mechatronics and mechanical systems, leveraging skills in engine repair and technical reports to deliver exceptional customer support and service. Strong abilities in communication and coordination, ensuring adherence to HSE standards while fostering effective customer relationships. Original strengths include a solid foundation in engineering principles and a commitment to high-quality outcomes.
